title: Pediatric Patient Safety Quiz Game-Based Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic patient safety management concepts and understanding of pediatric patient characteristics
context.additional_context: Game-based learning via smartphones combined with offline discussions.

learning_goals: Explain five international standards related to pediatric patient safety.
Apply pediatric patient safety accident prevention procedures with over 70% accuracy through quiz-based games.
Through team project presentations, propose three or more actual case analyses and improvement strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
